FILE: cm325670v11.0.txt
DYAD: ITALY - SAUDI ARABIA
RIVALRY: RIV870
DISPUTE(S): MID1129 


PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180809
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180809


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1129 

TERRMID: MID1129 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1129 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID1129 from Gibler 2018, this is the Saudi-Yemeni War of 1934, a territorial dispute between Saudi Arabia and Yemen. UK, France, and Italy are involved due to their support for the Yemen Arab Republic in this war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this is a territorial war between Yemen and Saudi Arabia. 

MARITMID: MID1129 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1129 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1129 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID1129 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1129 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1129 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1129 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES:
